definition: Blue House (Cheong Wa Dae), residence of the president of South Korea in Seoul

sentences.english: Park has stopped attending Cabinet and presidential staff meetings.
sentences.chinese: 朴槿惠已不再參加內閣和青瓦臺工作會議。

sentences.english: Lee held a press conference at Cheong Wa Dae, made the above remarks.
sentences.chinese: 李明博在青瓦臺舉行記者招待會，作出了上述表示。

definition: the few are no match for the many/heavily outnumbered/facing impossible odds (idiom)
